credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and linen on linen
Technique: cross, long-armed cross, double running, stem, "aztec" and deflected element work on plain weave foundation; counted stitches; hemmed at bottom and top; cut edge at right
description: Several bands of withdrawn element work including several bands of Aztec stitch.  At the bottom, a series of vegetal and animal motifs including a monkey dancing on a tree.  Inscription: "Cuando se un gusto una los maneja" with objects between words, perhaps in the form of a rebus or pictogram.
name: Sampler
